unnormalised: Arre yaar, itlim ankde yaad dovrunk kiteak itlench kotthin zata? Mhaka mhunn, mhojem bank account number mhunnlear, 1234567890123, ani magir asa IFSC code SBIN0001234. Mhaka PAN vixim uloychim poddonam, ABCDE1234F! Ani atam te mhojem UPI ID legit magtat, mhunnlear priya.sharma@upi. Hacho konnch shevott na? Mhaka dista tor fokot ekuch number ascho aslo mhunnlear sogllech yaad dovrunk mellto!
normalised: arre yaar, kiteak itlea ankdde ugddas dovrunk itle okhtte zata? mhunnllear, mhojem benk akhaunt ankddo asa, ek don tin char panch soy sat atth nou शून्य ek don tin, ani magir asa I-F-S-C kod S-B-I-N शून्य शून्य शून्य ek don tin char. P-A-N vishim mhaka uloi korunk di naka, A-B-C-D-E ek don tin char F! ani atam te mhojem U-P-I I-D ui magtat, mhunnllear priya.sharma at u-p-i. haka konnch shevott na? mhaka dista soglem ugddas dovrunk fakt ekuch ankddo aslo tor borem aslem!
text: Arre yaar, itlim ankde yaad dovrunk kiteak itlench kotthin zata? Mhaka mhunn, mhojem bank account number mhunnlear, 1234567890123, ani magir asa IFSC code SBIN0001234. Mhaka PAN vixim uloychim poddonam, ABCDE1234F! Ani atam te mhojem UPI ID legit magtat, mhunnlear priya.sharma@upi. Hacho konnch shevott na? Mhaka dista tor fokot ekuch number ascho aslo mhunnlear sogllech yaad dovrunk mellto!
